name: Rodina
subtitle: Blizard's Sniper
description: She is a sniper from an empire located in an extremely cold environment. She aims calmly no matter the circumstance. The more she focuses, the more powerful she becomes.
story: The empire's top ranking sniper, and a lover of bears. She likes them so much that she always wears accessories resembling a bear's ears on her hat. So, she'll sometimes hunts tigers, but she'll never shoot a bear. Although her shooting skills are most suitable for assassination, she swore to never use them for unjust reasons. Instead, she uses them to protect others. Currently, she lives with Pavel in the Windland Snow Mountain as his personal guard delegated by the empire.
like: Bears, polar bears, grizzly bears, small bears, large bears
dislike: Those who do not value live

talk: So, I've heard grilled Muhrooms are delicious? I'll have one, yay!!
Do you like veggies? I love them!
recruit.gift: Thank you!! Thank you for the meals!!

affinity.greet: Oh! Thank you for the invite!
talk: I'm hungry! Please give me food!

relationship.greet: Ah!? Salutations!! Have you eaten yet!
talk: A soldier's gun is equal to their life! Would you like to see my well-maintained rifle!?
The frost mage who lives in the Ice Cavern is far more gentle than you think! He still tries to pretend otherwise, so I turn a blind eye!
Is Sir Fluss not here? Thanks to him, life isn't all that bad!

uw.story: The essence of the most sophisticated imperial technology. Requiring superhuman precision, this rifle cannot be handled by a regular person. It has been magically enchanted to allow the shooter to see impossibly long distances. Even the greatest scope in the world, however, is useless in the hands of someone who can't aim with it. As such, the performance of this rifle has significantly depended on the skills of its users. Rodina, gifted with superb vision and precise control, is a suitable owner of this rifle. She went one step further and customized it to her preference, naming it Rodina Custom.

ut.story: A magazine about firearms being issued in the Empire. Issued regularly by Magos Le'Flamme, this firearms encyclopedia is Rodina's favorite magazine that contains various information about cutting-edge guns and weapons. Rodina has more faith in this magazine than she does for other magazines because it is edited under the supervision of Chief Director Valance, who Rodina is a big fan of.
